00025 {
00026     friend class AnswersManager;
00027
00028 protected:
00029     AnswerWaiter();

00031
00032 public:
00033     XMLMessage * GetAnswer(unsigned int TimeToWait);
00034     void Free();
00035
00036 protected:
00037     bool Use( unsigned int eMessageId );
00038
00039 private:
00040     ReentrantMutex ObjectMutex;    // A mutex to protect the structure
00041     Event Waiter;                // in order to wait for answer
00042     unsigned int MessageId;        // Num of my query, so num of the answer
00043     XMLMessage * AnswerMessage; // Received Message
00044     bool IsFree;                // Is this object free of use ? (memory and event creation
00045 };
